hizbs.text: wayastanbiunaka ahaqqun huwa qul i warabbi innahu lahaqqun wama antum bimuʿ'jizina
walaw anna likulli nafsin zalamat ma fi l-ardi la-if'tadat bihi wa-asarru l-nadamata lamma ra-awu l-ʿadhaba waqudiya baynahum bil-qis'ti wahum la yuz'lamuna
ala inna lillahi ma fi l-samawati wal-ardi ala inna waʿda l-lahi haqqun walakinna aktharahum la yaʿlamuna
yaayyuha l-nasu qad jaatkum mawʿizatun min rabbikum washifaon lima fi l-suduri wahudan warahmatun lil'mu'minina
qul bifadli l-lahi wabirahmatihi fabidhalika falyafrahu huwa khayrun mimma yajmaʿuna
qul ara-aytum ma anzala l-lahu lakum min riz'qin fajaʿaltum min'hu haraman wahalalan qul allahu adhina lakum am ʿala l-lahi taftaruna
wama zannu alladhina yaftaruna ʿala l-lahi l-kadhiba yawma l-qiyamati inna l-laha ladhu fadlin ʿala l-nasi walakinna aktharahum la yashkuruna

wama takunu fi shanin wama tatlu min'hu min qur'anin wala taʿmaluna min ʿamalin illa kunna ʿalaykum shuhudan idh tufiduna fihi wama yaʿzubu ʿan rabbika min mith'qali dharratin fi l-ardi wala fi l-samai wala asghara min dhalika wala akbara illa fi kitabin mubinin
ala inna awliyaa l-lahi la khawfun ʿalayhim wala hum yahzanuna
lahumu l-bush'ra fi l-hayati l-dun'ya wafi l-akhirati la tabdila likalimati l-lahi dhalika huwa l-fawzu l-ʿazimu
wala yahzunka qawluhum inna l-ʿizata lillahi jamiʿan huwa l-samiʿu l-ʿalimu
ala inna lillahi man fi l-samawati waman fi l-ardi wama yattabiʿu alladhina yadʿuna min duni l-lahi shurakaa in yattabiʿuna illa l-zana wa-in hum illa yakhrusuna
huwa alladhi jaʿala lakumu al-layla litaskunu fihi wal-nahara mub'siran inna fi dhalika laayatin liqawmin yasmaʿuna
qalu ittakhadha l-lahu waladan sub'hanahu huwa l-ghaniyu lahu ma fi l-samawati wama fi l-ardi in ʿindakum min sul'tanin bihadha ataquluna ʿala l-lahi ma la taʿlamuna
qul inna alladhina yaftaruna ʿala l-lahi l-kadhiba la yuf'lihuna
mataʿun fi l-dun'ya thumma ilayna marjiʿuhum thumma nudhiquhumu l-ʿadhaba l-shadida bima kanu yakfuruna
